pr_title: Stop running the Android framework detector

timeline.message: Stop running the Android framework detector

timeline.bodyText: Do we want to do this every time we open the project, or once per project? We do do w few things just once per project (showing the 'flutter has hot reload' notification) - this might be a candidate for the same.
timeline.author: devoncarew

replies.bodyText: It doesn't appear to be stored in project files.
replies.author: stevemessick
